++ Object Data Information Computer Program



+++ SUMMARY
  
  * set of Instructions 
    * can be executed by a computer to perform a specific task.
  
  * Basically Synonymous with ObjectDataInformationSoftware

+++ DETAILS

  * SourceCode is the name of a ComputerProgram in human readable form.

  * SourceCode can be streamed to a computer for execution in multiple ways:
     
    * 1) ComputerProgramCompiler converts to native MachineLanguage for [Executable]/[Application]. 
      * Native meaning the machine the code will run on.
      * MachineLanguage ComputerProgram(s) are translated using an [Assembler]. 
    
    * 2)An ObjectDataInformationComputerProgramInterpreter program can execute the SourceCode directly.
      * see 

    * 3) A mixture of Compilation and Interpretation: 
      * The programming language Java compiles into an a intermediate form 
        * executed by a Java interpreter.[2]
